name: Candor Careers Discord Bot
description: An all-in-one Discord application bot for Candor Studios. Candor Careers, using innovative AI technology, is a Discord bot that streamlines the application process for freelancers and staff members. It provides a user-friendly interface for applicants to submit their applications, which are then automatically processed and stored in a database. The bot also offers a range of features, including AI-powered application analysis, AI "simulated commissions", a user-friendly interface, and a range of other features that make it a valuable tool for Candor Studios.
